phrs.translation: [化]荧光显微法；[医]萤光显微镜检查
萤光光谱仪；荧光分光计
荧光分光光度计；萤光分光光谱仪

sentences.sentence: The compounds show absorption hypochromicity, fluorescence enhancement, DNA melting increasement when binding to CT·DNA.
sentences.translation: 结果显示，混配配合物与 DNA 作用时，使紫外吸收明显减色，荧光显著增强，DNA 熔点升高。

sentences.sentence: Three-dimensional fluorescence spectrum and ultraviolet absorption spectrum of Bletilla striata extraction drawn by boiling water were reported.
sentences.translation: 报道了白芨沸水浸取液的三维荧光光谱和紫外吸收光谱。

sentences.sentence: This approach USES fluorescence instead of magnetism to image samples.
sentences.translation: 该方法利用的是荧光而非影像样本的磁性。
